Fault.name: D:\GitHub\soasuitehandbook\ch9\QuickAndSlowHello\QuickAndSlowHello\SOA\composite.xml
Fault.msg: The service "dummyvehicle_client" exposed by component "DummyVehicle" is not wired to/used by any other component.

Fault.name: BPEL/CacheWriter.sbpel
Fault.fix: You should place all explicit <bpel:import> statements in a BPEL 2.0 process.
Fault.msg: There are no explicit "import" statements in <bpelx:subProcess> "CacheWriter" as required by BPEL 2.0 standard.

Fault.name: BPEL/QuickAndSlowProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Fix the process to be *either* durable or synchronous.
Fault.msg: Process "QuickAndSlowProcess" is both durable (onMessage,Receive,Wait) and synchronous.

Fault.name: BPEL/QuickAndSlowProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that the expression in <bpel:condition> is a boolean expression.
Fault.msg: The expression $intermediateResult/client:result in <bpel:condition> is not a boolean expression.

Fault.name: BPEL/CacheRetriever.sbpel
Fault.fix: You should place all explicit <bpel:import> statements in a BPEL 2.0 process.
Fault.msg: There are no explicit "import" statements in <bpelx:subProcess> "CacheRetriever" as required by BPEL 2.0 standard.
